content: sleeves from the yoke attach your yarn at the underarm of the jumper by slip_stitch through both v_stitch spaces round 1 ch3 dc1 in every stitch around and slip_stitch to the ch3 rounds 2-21 repeat round 1 fo and sew in ends round 22 shell row ch1 *sc1 sk1 dc5 in next stitch sk1 sc1* repeat from * until the end of the round slip_stitch to ch1 you should have a total of 7 shells repeat on the other sleeve fo and sew in ends main body *using 8mm hook* rounds 12-29 start each round with a ch3 dc1 in each stitch around slip_stitch to the top of the ch3 at the end of each round *using 5 5 mm hook* round 30 shell row ch1 single_crochet in same stitch *sc1 sk1 dc5 in next st sk1 sc1* repeat from * around the bottom of the jumper slip_stitch to ch1 at start of round you should have a total of 17 shells fo and sew in ends collar *using 5 5mm hook* round 1 attach your yarn by slip_stitch to the chain above a ch3 from the first row of the yoke ch3 dc1 in each stitch around slip_stitch to ch1 rounds 2-3 repeat round 1 round 4 ch3 1dc in next stitch double_crochet decrease in next stitch *dc1 in next 2 stitches double_crochet decrease in next stitch* repeat from * around ending with dc1 in the final two stitches slip_stitch to top of beginning ch3 *using 3 5mm hook* round 5 ch1 *sc1 sk1 dc5 in the next stitch sk1 sc1* repeat from * until the end of the round if you have a spare stitch at the end of the round sc1 in this stitch then slip_stitch to the ch1 at the beginning you should have a total of 19 shells fo and sew in ends contact for any help with this pattern please contact lily at lilyindia@outlook com and put lily jumper pattern as the email subject
